title: Short-Intensive Course for Mathematics Teachers’ Professional Development Through Lesson Study

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to develop math teachers' collaborative expertise by applying the Lesson Study methodology in mobile-based learning environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four-stage (plan-implement-observe-reflect) process of Lesson Study to real-world cases
Learners can improve mathematics lesson design and implementation strategies through collaboration with peer teachers
Learners can analyze student engagement levels and incorporate feedback using a lesson observation checklist
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
